%
% Do Not Edit - Main file
%
\documentclass[12pt,a4paper]{article}
\usepackage{ULSA/Modele}
\usepackage{Commandes}


\usepackage{lastpage}

\usepackage{fancyhdr}

\fancypagestyle{main}{%
    \fancyhf{}%
    \fancyfoot[L]{\textbf{\getModuleSemesterShort{}}}
    \fancyfoot[C]{\textsc{\nouppercase{\rightmark}}}
    \fancyfoot[R]{\textbf{\thepage/\pageref{LastPage}}}
    \renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt} 
    \renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0pt}   
}

\fancypagestyle{preamble}{%
    \fancyhf{}%
    \fancyfoot[C]{\thepage}
    \renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt} 
    \renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0pt}   
}
\AtBeginDocument{\addtocontents{toc}{\protect\thispagestyle{preamble}}} 


\begin{document}
\pagenumbering{Roman}
\import{./}{Infos.tex}
\pagestyle{preamble}
\UlsaFrontMatter{}

\pagestyle{main}
\pagenumbering{arabic}
\import{./}{Document.tex}
\end{document}
